name: Gbahali
description: The Gbahali is a huge beast with the ability to camouflage itself seamlessly into its natural surroundings, showcasing impressive physical prowess.
memorable: Excellently skilled in stealth with its Shifting Camouflage ability allows it to blend into environments, which makes it a deadly ambusher.
goals: Primarily driven by instinct, it seeks to hunt and defend its territory.
relations: May be encountered alongside other large beasts in natural settings.
environment: Typically found in natural terrains such as forests or jungles.
strengths: High physical strength and durability, fast movement, excellent stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence indicates poor cognitive abilities.
attacks: Utilizes a bite attack that grapples smaller targets and two claw attacks for slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Shifting Camouflage grants advantage on stealth checks in natural terrain, making it a formidable ambusher.
senses: Has a passive perception score of 14, allowing it to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Possesses high skill in Stealth with a +8 modifier, making it difficult to detect when hiding.
additional_information: Exceptional physical presence with a Strength score of 19.
Agility and durability reflected by a Dexterity and Constitution of 14 and 19 respectively.
Can grapple Medium or smaller targets, restraining them during combat.

highly agile creature with grappling attacks
huge beast with natural armor and strength
